title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
OB: When I use Ctrl+M (Add Import), nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace within the selection.
EB: When I use Ctrl+M (Add Import), the trailing whitespace within the selection should be ignored and the import should be added as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a code snippet with trailing whitespace. 
2. Use the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+M to trigger the 'Add Import' action.
3. Observe that nothing happens and the import is not added.
